content.text: Let's learn how to start a small conversation about 'le temps' (the weather), a classic topic for small talk in France.
In French, we use the impersonal pronoun 'il' to talk about the weather, like in 'Il pleut'.

data.tip: The 'p' and 's' at the end are silent.

data.phrase: Hier, il y avait du soleil

content.title: Starting a Conversation
content.setting: You are at a bus stop next to a friendly-looking stranger. It suddenly starts to rain.

conversation_flow.title: Make a comment about the weather
End of part 1
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oui, hier, il y avait du soleil.

content.text: When speaking to a stranger in French, it's polite to use the formal 'vous' form.

data.phrase: Vous connaissez la météo pour demain ?
data.meaning: Do you know the weather forecast for tomorrow?

content.text: To make a sentence negative, place 'ne... pas' around the verb. For example, 'Je n'aime pas' means 'I don't like'.

content.title: Discussing the Forecast
content.setting: You continue your conversation with the stranger at the bus stop.

conversation_flow.title: Ask if they know the forecast
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: J'espère que le temps est bon demain.

conversation_flow.title: Say you hope the sun shines
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Non, je ne connais pas la météo.

conversation_flow.title: Say you don't like the wind
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Moi aussi. Je n'aime pas la pluie.

conversation_flow.title: End of part 2
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oui. Le vent, ce n'est pas bon.

data.phrase: Ce n'est pas bon pour le vélo
data.meaning: It is not good for cycling

content.text: 'Voilà' is a handy word that means 'there it is' or 'here it is'. Use it to point things out.

data.tip: The 'oy' sounds like 'wa' in 'water'. The 'g' is soft, like the 's' in 'pleasure'.

content.title: Ending the Conversation
content.setting: As you finish your chat, you see the bus approaching.

conversation_flow.title: Say this weather isn't good for cycling
Point out that the bus is arriving
Wish them a good trip
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oui ! Voilà le bus. Au revoir !
